description: Variation of Conditions 2 (Approved Plans) for removal of 2no trees from landscaping scheme of Planning Permission 18/16273/FUL (Application under S73A Condition 2 (Landscaping) of Planning Permission 10/16172/FUL, as varied by 13/16517/FUL (Erection of part three part four storey building with basement and a three storey building to provide a total of 21 flats (8 x 1 bedroom, 11 x 2 bedroom and 2 x 3 bedroom flats)).
